docs.text: AISoc Workshops (Semester 2 2024/2025) Welcome to the University of Leeds' AI Society Workshops for Semester 2 of the 2024/2025 academic year! Description This repository contains all the resources and materials for the workshops that will be held throughout the semester. Each workshop will have its own folder containing the relevant files and instructions. Workshops Workshop 1: Introduction to AI Workshop 2: Building a Machine Learning Pipeline Workshop 3: Neural Networks Workshop 4: Ethics of AI Workshop 5: AI Mini-Hackathon Workshop 6: AI Project Showcase Organiser Omar Choudhry ( O.Choudhry@leeds.ac.uk ) LinkedIn GitHub License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details.
